questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: IT IS EXPRESSLY UNDERSTOOD THAT ADHERENCE TO THIS POLICY MUST TAKE PLACE COMPULSORILY BEFORE THE DEPARTURE OF THE FLIGHT (NO LATER THAN 7 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE).
